titleStmt.title: Truth and falshood, or, A comparison betweene the truth now taught in England, and the doctrine of the Romish church: with a briefe confutation of that popish doctrine. Hereunto is added an answere to such reasons as the popish recusants alledge, why they will not come to our churches. By Francis Bunny, sometime fellow of Magdalen College in Oxford
titleStmt.author: Bunny, Francis, 1543-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Valentine Sims, for Rafe Lacson, dwelling in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the white Swanne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
